page.title: 18SURVEY OF FAMILIES
page.content: Our survey showed that many of the families came to live in Royston quite recently. 25% of dads work in Royston.Many dads travel to London,Stevenage and Camb- ridge. Very few mums and dads were born in Royston. Lots of families came from London to live in Royston,and even from as far afield as Scotland,USA and Holland. Over two_thirds of the families do their main weekly shopping in Royton, but some do their main weekly shopping in Stevenage and Hitchin. More than half of the families surveyed own one car,although nearly 20% of the families own three cars. About 50% of the parents have two children,but a small percentage have more than four children or only a single child.
